sentences.english: But a hungry heron flew down and swallowed him up for supper.
sentences.chinese: 但一只饥饿的鹭飞下来，把他当晚餐吞了。

sentences.english: The heron is one of the UK's largest native birds and grey herons are also common around garden ponds.
sentences.chinese: 鹭是英国最大本土鸟类之一，苍鹭也经常出现在池塘。

sentences.english: but a hungry heron flew down and swallowed him up for supper.
sentences.chinese: 但是，一个饥饿的鹭飞下来，吞没了他吃晚饭。

sentences.english: Their habits and other similar spoonbill.
sentences.chinese: 它们的习性和其他鹭相似。

definition: oriole or various birds of the Sylvidae family including warblers

to perch/to rest (of birds)/to dwell/to live/to stay
